contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=February 2013}} {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Aa en Hunze | image_flag = Flag of Aa en Hunze.svg | flag_size = 120px | flag_alt = Flag of Aa en Hunze | image_seal = | seal_size = | seal_alt = | image_shield = Aa en Hunze-wapen.svg | shield_size = 100px | shield_alt = Coat of arms of Aa en Hunze |image_map = LocatieAaEnHunze.png |mapsize = 250px |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[Drenthe]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 278.86 |area_land_km2 = 276.86 |area_water_km2 = 2.00 |population_as_of = 1 January 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline]. |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 25549 |population_density_km2 = 92 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 |latd=52|latm=57|lats=|latNS=N |longd=6|longm=36|longs=|longEW=E |coordinates_display = inline,title }} [[File:Hunebed D14 eexterhalte.jpg|left|thumb|200px|[[Dolmen]] in Aa en Hunze]] '''Aa en Hunze''' ({{Pronunciation|027 Aa en Hunze.ogg}}) is a [[municipality]] in the northeastern [[Netherlands]]. The names '[[Aa (river)|Aa]]' (more precisely the '[[Drentsche Aa]]') and 'Hunze' refer to two small [[rivers]] through the municipality. ==Population centres== *[[Achter 't Hout]] *[[Amen, Netherlands|Amen]] *[[Anderen]] *[[Anloo]] *[[Annen]] *[[Annerveenschekanaal]] *[[BalloÃ«rveld]] *[[Balloo, Drenthe|Balloo]] *[[Bareveld]] *[[Bonnen]] *[[Bonnerveen]] *[[Bosje]] *[[Bovenstreek]] *[[De Hilte]] *[[Deurze]] *[[Eext]] *[[Eexterveen]] *[[Eexterveenschekanaal]] *[[Eexterzandvoort]] *[[Ekehaar]] *[[Eldersloo]] *[[Eleveld]] *[[Gasselte]] *[[Gasselterboerveen]] *[[Gasselterboerveenschemond]] *[[Gasselternijveen]] *[[Gasselternijveenschemond 1e Dwarsdiep]] *[[Gasselternijveenschemond 2e Dwarsdiep]] *[[Gasteren]] *[[Geelbroek]] *[[Gieten]] *[[Gieterveen]] *[[Gieterzandvoort]] *[[Grolloo]] *[[Kostvlies]] *[[Marwijksoord]] *[[Nieuw-Annerveen]] *[[Nieuwediep]] *[[Nijlande]] *[[Nooitgedacht]] *[[Oud-Annerveen]] *[[Papenvoort, Drenthe|Papenvoort]] *[[Rolde]] *[[Schipborg]] *[[Schoonlo]] *[[Schreierswijk]] *[[Spijkerboor, Drenthe|Spijkerboor]] *[[Streek]] *[[Torenveen]] *[[Veenhof]] *[[Vredenheim]] ==Long place names== The very small hamlets ''Gasselternijveenschemond 1e Dwarsdiep'' and ''Gasselternijveenschemond 2e Dwarsdiep'' have the longest settlement names in the Netherlands. '''Gasselterboerveenschemond''' is the longest single-word placename in the country. ==Transportation== There is no railway station in the municipality. The nearest station is [[Assen railway station]]. To plan a train journey see [http://www.ns.nl]. ===Bus services=== To plan your journey see [http://www.9292ov.nl]. * 10: Assen - Deurze - Rolde - Gieten - De Hilte - Bareveld - Veendam - Winschoten * 21: Assen - Deurze - Rolde - Grolloo - Schoonloo - Emmen * 24: Assen - Deurze - Rolde - Papenvoort - Borger - Buinen - Buinerveen - Nieuw-Buinen - Stadskanaal * 28: Assen - Deurze - Rolde - Gieten - Gasselte - Gasselternijveen - Gasselternijveenschemond - Stadskanaal * 58: Groningen - Haren - Zuidlaren - Schuilingsoord - Annen - Anloo - Loon - Assen * 59: Emmen - Borger - Gasselte - Gieten - Eext - Annen * Buurtbus 93: Gieten - De Hilte - Eexterveen - Annerveen - Spijkerboor - Annen - Spijkerboor - Zuidlaren * Buurtbus 94: Gieten - De Hilte - Gieterveen - Bonnerveen - Gasselterboerveen - Gasselternijveen - Drouwenerveen - Drouwenermond - Stadskanaal * Qliner 300: Groningen - Gieten - Borger - Emmen (express) * Qliner 302: Groningen - Gieten - Gasselte - Gasselternijveen - Stadskanaal (express) * Qliner 318: Groningen - Westlaren - Zuidlaren - Schuilingsoord - Annen (express) ==External links== *[http://www.aaenhunze.nl Official Website] <!--Please note that not all directions need to be filled--> <!--Please note that preferably only neighboring municipalities or bodies of water should be used--> {{Geographic location |Centre = Aa en Hunze |North = [[Hoogezand-Sappemeer]]{{space}}([[Groningen (province)|GR]]) |Northeast = [[Veendam]]{{space}}([[Groningen (province)|GR]]) |East = [[Stadskanaal]]{{space}}([[Groningen (province)|GR]]) |Southeast = [[Borger-Odoorn]] |South = [[Coevorden]] |Southwest = [[Midden-Drenthe]] |West = [[Assen]] |Northwest = [[Tynaarlo]] }} {{Drenthe Province}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Aa En Hunze}} [[Category:Municipalities of Drenthe]]
